resources.string: Please verify your account on the email address you just provided and then login again.
Please enter a number to contact in case of danger
Please consider the following for your own safety
Do not join a ride if it does not seem legitimate.
Do not join a ride if people who are in it seem suspicious.
Do not create a ride with incorrect details, it could lead you into trouble.
Communicate with the fellow commuters before travelling.
Do not forget to use the SOS button on the top right of the app incase you are in danger.
Let someone from your family know whom you are travelling with.
Oh and carrying along a small can of pepper spray never hurts.
Please verify your account on the email address you just provided and then login again.
An Email will be sent to your registered email address.
You can change your password through the link in the mail.
After pressing the send email button, logout and reset your password.
Please set a text message to send it to your dear ones when you feel you are in danger
The default message is set below, you can change as per your wish
